name: Zombie Defense
description:
Epidemic, you're a Special Forces unit fighter, that's why you're still alive. Your task is to hold your positions.

Single Player: Kill hordes of zombies alone.

Cooperative game: for 1-4 players.

Weapons: Check out the wide range in the arsenal and arm yourself with your favorite firearms! (currently 5 types of weapons)

Zombies: An easy target, but they get stronger and faster each time

Mutants: Difficult to kill, getting faster each time

Locations: 2 highly detailed maps on which you can think about where to hold the defense.
